author: nick
msg: TIKA-793 follow-on: MP3 files can have more than one comment, as long as the language+description pair is unique, so support capturing multiple comments

author: hwright
msg: Ev2 shims: Track and provide the base revision for various operations.
Current number of Ev2 test failures: 177
* subversion/libsvn_delta/compat.c
(ev2_dir_baton, ev2_file_baton, prop_args, path_checksum_args): Add
base_revision member.
(process_actions): Capture and use the base revision for prop and text mods.
(ev2_open_root, ev2_add_directory, ev2_open_directory, ev2_add_file,
ev2_open_file): Capture the base revision in the baton.
(ev2_change_dir_prop, ev2_apply_textdelta, ev2_change_file_prop):
Capture the base revision in the action args.
(operation): Include the base revision for this operation.
(get_operation): Save the base revision.
(build): Use the given base revision when fetching the right operation.
(ensure_root_opened): Provide the correct base revision.
(set_props_cb, set_text_cb): Pass the provided revision along.
(drive_tree): Call delta editor functions with the right base revision.
(start_edit_func): Set the root operation base revision.
